name: Conjure Dident
note:
<Critical Rate: 30%>

<Item 32 Cost: 15>


<Custom Execution>

if(user.isActor)
{
if (user.isStateAffected(33) == false)
{

if (item.useCount == null)
{
item.useCount = 1
}
else
{
item.useCount+=1
}
}
 }
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
if(user.isActor())
{
if (item.useCount == 3)
{

skill = (item.id+1)
user.learnSkill(skill)

$gameMessage.add( $dataSkills[skill].name + " has been learned")
}
} 
</After Eval>

*DS = 2*
name: Paralyzing Dust
note:
<Item 22 Cost: 6>


<Custom Execution>
$gameParty.loseItem($dataItems[27],6 );


if(user.isActor)
{
if (user.isStateAffected(33) == false)
{

if (item.useCount == null)
{
item.useCount = 1
}
else
{
item.useCount+=1
}
}
 }
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
if(user.isActor())
{
if (item.useCount == 3)
{

skill = (item.id+1)
user.learnSkill(skill)

$gameMessage.add( $dataSkills[skill].name + " has been learned")
}
} 
</After Eval>

description:
30% chance to Infect enemy.
*Instant while FT < 20*
name: Taste Bite
note:
<Instant Eval>
if (user.tp < 20) instant = true;
 </Instant Eval>


<Custom Requirement>
var value = (a.skillTpGain($dataSkills[item.id])*a.tcr)

   if ( user.tp <= (100-value) )
{ 
value = true;
   } else {
     value = false;

}

</Custom Requirement>

 <Cost Display Eval>
   var variableId = 59;
   var value = (a.skillTpGain($dataSkills[item.id])*a.tcr);
   $gameVariables.setValue(variableId, value);
  </Cost Display Eval>

<Custom Cost Display>
   \c[14] + \v[59] FT
  </Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
var value = (a.skillTpGain($dataSkills[item.id])*a.tcr)
a.gainTp(value)
if(user.isActor)
{
if (user.isStateAffected(33) == false)
{

if (item.useCount == null)
{
item.useCount = 1
}
else
{
item.useCount+=1
}
}
 }
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
result = b.isStateAffected(37)
if ( result == 1 )
{
b.transform(6);
b.addState(14);
}
if(user.isActor())
{
if (item.useCount == 3)
{

skill = (item.id+1)
user.learnSkill(skill)

$gameMessage.add( $dataSkills[skill].name + " has been learned")
}
} 
</After Eval>

   if ( user.tp <= (100-value) )
{ 
value = true;
   } else {
     value = false;

}

</Custom Requirement>

 <Cost Display Eval>
   var variableId = 59;
   var value = (a.skillTpGain($dataSkills[item.id])*a.tcr);
   $gameVariables.setValue(variableId, value);
  </Cost Display Eval>

<Custom Cost Display>
   \c[14] + \v[59] FT
  </Custom Cost Display>

<Custom Execution>
var value = (a.skillTpGain($dataSkills[item.id])*a.tcr)
a.gainTp(value)

if(user.isActor)
{
if (user.isStateAffected(33) == false)
{
if (item.useCount == null)
{
item.useCount = 1
}
else
{
item.useCount+=1
}
} }
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
if(user.isActor())
{
if (item.useCount == 10)
{

skill = (item.id+1)
user.learnSkill(skill)

$gameMessage.add( $dataSkills[skill].name + " has been learned")
}
}

description:
Swap from Incubus to Succubus form or vice versa
*Instant, This move does not upgrade*
name: Fatigue Swap
note:
<Instant Cast>

<Custom Execution>
var shardAM = $gameParty.numItems($dataItems[32])

var fatAM = user.tp

var fatDif = (shardAM*0.50)-fatAM

var shardDif = (fatAM*2)-shardAM

if (fatAM < shardAM*0.50)
{
user.gainTp(fatDif)
$gameParty.loseItem($dataItems[32],fatDif )

}
else
{
$gameParty.gainItem($dataItems[32],shardDif )
user.gainTp(-shardDif)
}
</Custom Execution>

name: Raise Charge
note:
<Before Eval>
var randomN = Math.floor(Math.random()* (200 -  50)) + 150
for (var i = 0; i < b.skills().length; ++i) {
  var skill = b.skills()[i];
  if (skill === this.item()) continue;
 
    if (skill.tpGain > 0) {
      skill.tpGain *= randomN/200 
	  if (skill.tpGain > 100)
        {
         skill.tpGain -= (tpGain-100)
        }
	if (skill.tpGain < 0)
        {
         skill.tpGain += (100+tpGain)
        }

	                       }
else
{
skill.tpCost *= randomN/200 
	  if (skill.tpCost > 100)
        {
         skill.tpCost -= (tpCost-100)
        }
	if (skill.tpCost < 0)
        {
         skill.tpCost += (100+tpCost)
        }
}
    
     
                     
                             
                                }                 

</Before Eval>

 <Cost Display Eval>
   var variableId = 58;

   $gameVariables.setValue(variableId, value);
  </Cost Display Eval>

<Custom Cost Display>
   \c[14] - \v[58] FT
  </Custom Cost Display>


<Custom Execution>
if(user.isActor)
{
if (user.isStateAffected(33) == false)
{
if (item.useCount == null)
{
item.useCount = 1
}
else
{
item.useCount+=1
}
} }
</Custom Execution>

<After Eval>
if(user.isActor())
{
if (item.useCount == 5)
{

skill = (item.id+1)

$gameMessage.add( $dataSkills[skill].name + " has been learned")
}
} 
</After Eval>
